abstract: A federal district court judge delivered a major setback to Alcatel-Lucent by setting aside a jury’s judgment against Microsoft in a patent infringement lawsuit over digital music technology.
snippet: A federal district court judge delivered a major setback to Alcatel-Lucent by setting aside a jury’s judgment against Microsoft in a patent infringement lawsuit over digital music technology.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Aug. 6 — A federal district court judge delivered a major setback to Alcatel-Lucent on Monday by setting aside a jury’s $1.5 billion judgment against Microsoft in a patent infringement lawsuit over digital music technology.

headline.main: $1.5 Billion Verdict Against Microsoft Is Set Aside
headline.print_headline: Judge Sets Aside Record $1.5 Billion Verdict Against Microsoft in MP3 Case

abstract: Hot stories today from Microsoft, Apple, Palm, Buy.com, Dell and more.
snippet: Hot stories today from Microsoft, Apple, Palm, Buy.com, Dell and more.
lead_paragraph: Dell bought Zing, a consumer electronics software company. Dell’s other consumer electronics ventures, like the Dell DJ MP3 player, have been flops. [GigaOm, Release]

headline.main: Quick Bits: Dell Tries Zing, Steve Case Sells Lime, Palm Hears Silence
